game.title: The Dragon's Hoard
game.objective: Recover the dragon's hoard from the dragon's lair.
game.description: The dragon Smaug has stolen a vast hoard of gold and jewels from the dwarves of Erebor. The dwarves have hired you to recover the hoard and return it to them.
game.reward: A share of the dragon's hoard.

task.description: The dragon's lair is said to be located in the Lonely Mountains. Travel to the Lonely Mountains and search for the lair.
Once you have located the dragon's lair, defeat Smaug to recover the hoard.

task.objective: Recover and return the hoard to Erebor.
task.description: After retrieving the hoard, deliver it to the dwarves of Erebor.
